hackathon-description-text: Join a passionate, innovative group for 12 hours of hacking in Houston, TX. We'll provide food, mentorship, cool swag, educational workshops, and prizes. You just bring a laptop and a desire to build something awesome.
hackathon-eligibility: Individuals over 18 may enter. Individuals under 18 must have a parent or guardian present throughout the event.
hackathon-requirements: All project submissions are due to DevPost by 6pm!
hackathon-rules:
3-5 is ideal
You have ~8 hours
Mentors are available
3 minutes. No slides.
Here are the criteria:
We’ll choose an overall winner, then runner-ups ‘til we’re out of prizes! :)
 
Code of Conduct: https://hackcodeofconduct.org/

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This is the overall winning team, based on the judging criteria: Pretty Design, Technically Badass, Social Impact, and Team/Developer Growth.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=10111 Richmond Ave, Houston, TX 77042, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Great color palette, sleek graphics, excellent user experience, etc.
Interesting use of data sets or APIs, innovative algorithms, cool cutting-edge technologies, etc.
How does the project help people in our community or the world at large
Pushing beyond your current limits, learning new technologies & skills, whether you began the day as a novice or a pro

hackathon-description-header: Join a passionate, diverse group of developers for 12 hours of hacking in Houston, TX.
